Name: must_match_active_sprint_status
Description: Only consider sprints that are currently active or planned

Name: must_match_ordered_backlog_status
Description: Product Backlog must be in an ordered/ready state

Name: must_match_worker_availability
Description: Workers assigned must meet availability requirements

Name: cannot_match_critical_blocker_severity
Description: Exclude tasks blocked by critical severity blockers

Name: may_match_high_stakeholder_influence
Description: Prefer items with highly influential stakeholders

Name: must_match_team_size_capacity
Description: Team size must be within capacity limits for a sprint

Name: may_match_low_feature_effort
Description: Prefer features with lower estimated effort

Name: must_match_user_story_acceptance_criteria
Description: User stories must have clear acceptance criteria

Name: must_match_release_plan_status
Description: Only include features from release plans marked ready

Name: must_match_sprint_goal_defined
Description: Sprints must have a defined objective description

Name: may_match_positive_velocity_trend
Description: Prefer teams with positive velocity trends
